subject: Move constants.ts out of api/ to prevent stray Vercel endpoint
body:
Vercel treats every file in api/ as a serverless function. constants.ts
is a helper module (no handler), so it was being exposed as a broken
/api/constants endpoint. Move it to lib/ where Vercel won't touch it.

https://claude.ai/code/session_018GdxVNVycPS8x1KTytw3hi
title: Move constants.ts out of api/ to prevent stray Vercel endpoint
